headline.main: Report: Israeli Leader Briefly Offered Pro-Peace Government
headline.print_headline: Report: Israeli Leader Briefly Offered Pro-Peace Government

lead_paragraph: An Israeli newspaper is reporting that Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu offered the country's opposition leader a unity government late last year that would promote a regional peace initiative — before backing out.
snippet: An Israeli newspaper is reporting that Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu offered the country's opposition leader a unity government late last year that would promote a regional peace initiative — before backing out....
